column4: Is UbuntuStudio any good?  I hate regular Ubuntu for recording music and use Windows.
I wish things just worked with Linux, like they do with Windows.  I seriously do not understand the hatred of Windows.
I hate windows because they force you and the hardware vendors to go their way, creating a monopoly, with linux I have a choice
on that note, I have a machine that works great with linux, cd and dvd player, XP supports neither
